item.title: Disclaimer
item.description: Please be aware that all content posted on this website represents only my personal opinion and is based on experience I´ve made – it does not represent VMware’s positions, strategies or opinions.

item.title: About me
item.description: Robert Guske My name is Robert Guske and I´d like to welcome you to my blog. I´ve started my journey back in 2016 within VMware´s Professional Service Organization (PSO) as a Technical Account Manager. In case you don´t know exactly what a TAM does, I´d like to forward you to this -> post which describes it in perfect words. I´m an accomplished, hands-on, & well informed IT professional with 15+ years of experience in providing strategic guidance regarding IT technology and infrastructural enhancements to clients and organizations.
